# About {.unnumbered}

Hi, welcome to my Learning Diary for Remotely Sensing City and Environments module!
This module is part of the Bartlett Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis (CASA), University College London (UCL) master's level course in Urban Spatial Science. 

My name is Hania and I am currently being train to become urban spatial scientist, but my background is in physics and arts. I am passionate about data visualisation and experimenting with different ways to communicate spatial analysis topics to broader audience.

Enjoy earth observation insights, remote sensing techniques and some infographics!
